entities.description: The different response categories available for a survey question.
The count of responses in each category before weighting.
The percentage of total responses in each category after weighting.
The number of responses that were not provided or left blank.
Total number of cases considered in the survey.
Summary statistics for the collected data, such as mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Type of variable used for the survey question, such as numeric.
Any estimated quantities provided in the survey.

relationships.description: Enumerates the response options for a particular survey question.
Specifies the unweighted frequency count for each response option.
Specifies the weighted percentage for each response option.
Indicates the amount of missing data for a survey variable.
Indicates the total number of cases included in the survey.
Provides statistical summaries for a survey variable.
Specifies the type of a survey variable.
Specifies the estimated quantities provided in the context of the survey.
